Literature.Title: A natural peptide and its variants derived from the processing of infectious pancreatic necrosis virus (IPNV) displaying enhanced antimicrobial activity: a novel alternative for the control of bacterial diseases.
Literature.Author: Jofré C, Guzmán F, Cárdenas C, Albericio F, Marshall SH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 23213(no activity data),Escherichia coli(no activity data),Vibrio anguillarum ATCC 19106(no activity data),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 19108(no activity data),Vibrio ordalii(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(90-100% Inhibition=50µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 49461(90-100% Inhibition=50µM),Piscirickettsia salmonis LF-89(no activity data)
